(:action attach ; Attach an item to a target location and update ownership status
    :parameters (?agent - entity ?item - object ?target - location)
    :precondition (and (possessed ?item ?agent) (at ?agent ?target))
    :effect (and (attached ?item ?target) (not (possessed ?item ?agent))

(:action clean
    ; Clean a specified target and update its state
    :parameters (?agent - person ?tool - object ?target - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (attached ?tool ?agent) (dirty ?target))
    :effect (and (clean ?target) (not (dirty ?target))
